extendedInfo.description: ** AppGarden for Android Rolls Together Dozens Of Useful Tools into One App - Lifehacker.com **** AppGarden Brings a Slew of Useful Utilities - XDA developers **** App Garden: A Swiss Army Knife for Your Phone - Appstorm **A collection of useful utilities in one simple easy to use app. Several apps also have several sources to choose from. Here is a small sample of what's available and more coming soon. Also, I'd like to extend a big thank you to the great people over at stands4 for their great support and API access.AbbreviationsConversions: acceleration, area, bandwidth/data type, circular measure, currency, decimal to roman numeral, energy, flow rate, fuel consumption, length/distance, liquid volume, power, pressure, sound, time, temperature, wavelength to RGB, weight/massDays untilArea code lookupBi-gram phrasesAirport codesCountdown timerDictionary w/ 3 sourcesExample word usageFilm related: Film information such as cast, cost etc, Rotten tomatoes reviewsDiscount calculatorMortgage calculatorSales tax calculatorStandard calculatorReminders / AlarmsQR code scannerTip calculatorBasal metabolic rateBody fatBody Mass Index (BMI)Daily caloric intakeMax heart rateOne rep maxTarget heart rateWaist to hip ratioWater intakeFitness relatedHoliday listings from 6 countriesMappingMusic related: Album art, artist information, artist image, similar artists, events via gps, track/song informationOhm's LawPhrasesPastebinPostal code lookupPronunciationsQuestion and answerRandom numberRandom passwordRandom quoteSlangSpelling suggestionsStock quoteStopwatchSyllablesSynonymsSystem statsTimezone information using latitude/longitude or using current GPS positionThesaurus w/ 3 sourcesUrban dictionaryBit.ly URL shortenerWeather using GPS, zipcode, city, alertsWhois lookupWikipediaStatusbar notesAudio recorderWord etymology			    Word of the dayRhyming words w/ 2 sources.Country informationCurrent elevationNeighborhood information* Text Utilities- Escape/Unescape URL's, URI's, & XML- Encode/decode Base64- Adjust cases to/from UPPERCASE, lowercase, sWITCH cASE, Title Case, First letter of sentence- Trim leading and trailing spaces- Convert String to hex and vice versa- Search and replace feature- Text statistics which include word count, line numbers, character count, space count, word occurences including percentages.- Import plain text files via SD or internal memory- Export changes as plain text files- Lexical density- Display word count based on word length- Display unique word count- Average word length- Characters without spaces- Convert binary to string and vice versa* File compare - import/compare text files and hilight differences- Percent calculators* gross margin* percent calculator* percent change* percent increase/decrease* percentage- Dice roller* Wallpapers / backgrounds* On this day- Audio frequencies- Integer set generator- List randomizer- Names- Playing card shuffler- Sequence generator- Recipe of the day- Random composite numbers- Random prime numbers- Random odd numbers- Random even numbers- Random file generator- Raw Random Bytes

reviews.title: Love but
reviews.comment: All the things I need in one place. Could you ADD A TALLY COUNTER!? It would be amazing!!!! Thank you!!
reviews.author: Mandy Bradford

reviews.title: excellent program!
reviews.comment: great collection of useful utilities, am now able to uninstall several stand alone apps which appgarden has now replaced. Had a problem downloading the pro version but dev was very swift in replying to my problem and had it fixed in no time...money well worth spent!
reviews.author: Gerhard S

reviews.title: Random recipe
reviews.comment: Total disaster, most of other functions, a big and loud bravo
reviews.author: Dmytro Shkryoba

reviews.title: Very useful app
reviews.comment: Lots of fun.  Worth the 1.99 to update.  Like weather and word of the day. Like this day in history...should be in numeric order though.
reviews.author: Pat Zanzi

reviews.title: Too Much Fun.
reviews.comment: I\'m a nerd. This is nerd food.  For those nerd-ly-challenged: It\'s mighty handy too.
reviews.author: Thomas Hochman

reviews.title: Great All in One place tool!
reviews.comment: I use it all the time. Replaced a lot of apps with similar functions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic.
reviews.comment: This is just a really really good application. It does everything it is meant to properly. Two points I\'d like to raise: they should improve integration with weather in non-US locations (though it works well when I tell it to search by coordinates) and most of the sub-apps could do with a little more polish in the presentation.   But don\'t think that any of that compromises the application as a whole; I am very pleased to have purchased this application, it provides an excellent service.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung infuse
reviews.comment: I found app garden on dipper I have love it app needed replaced a lot of other apps save a lot of space a must app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ALL in one place
reviews.comment: I haven\'t even tried a fraction of the tools, yet, but the few that I have are awesome! Even cooler, though, is knowing that not only is there an app for *insert need*, but that I almost certainly (now) already have it. You\'ll want this \"just because\"!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beyond useful!
reviews.comment: Great app with any tool you could ever need! Now I can delete quite a few other apps bc this one does it all! No problems encountered as of yet either!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eliminates many other apps
reviews.comment: This is a very useful app that replaces a bunch of other apps. My only gripe is there is so much in here, I forget what is available...and that\'s not that bad either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: The count down timer needs to beep or alert when time is up.   An IP calculator would be useful (to me at least.).   Oh,  and a pony. I want a pony too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the most useful apps on G/play...
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this app. I upgraded from the free version with no regrets. More than worth it. Very useful, fun and runs well on the LG Nitro.
reviews.author: Orange Moon

reviews.title: Admob
reviews.comment: The paid for version has Admob
reviews.author: Jerome Womack
